message: Let's start with a fair deal. I'll take 90% and you can have 10%.  This way, we both get a good share, and we can avoid the risk of inflation eating away at our gains in future rounds.

Alice, your initial offer was heavily skewed in your favor.  Let's be more realistic. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor.  This reflects the risk I'm taking with inflation.  Let's close this out and both walk away with a good amount.

Bob, your offer was too one-sided. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor.  This is fair, considering the risk you took by rejecting my initial offer. We can end this now and avoid further inflation losses.

Alice, we're at an impasse.  I understand you want a larger share, but my offers have been reasonable considering the inflation risk. This is my final offer - a 55/45 split in my favor.  If you reject this, I'm not sure we'll reach an agreement.
